.
Steps to Follow When Providing Medical Evidence to SSA
Follow the steps in the table below when providing medical evidence to SSA.
Step
Action
1
Annotate the cover letter that accompanied
Form SSA-827
to show which records VA is providing.
2
Send the records SSA requested, along with a
photocopy
of the cover letter, to the SSA office that requested them.
3
File the original cover letter and
Form SSA-827
in the corresponding claims folder.
Note
:Â  If the claims folder is entirely paperless, upload the documents into the corresponding electronic claims folder (eFolder).
4
Clear end product (EP) 400 (for work credit).
